title: Understanding Scientific Leadership and Neoliberal Capitalism Through Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Project execution emphasizing collaboration and critical thinking in a smartphone-centric technology environment

learning_goals: Collaborative problem-solving competencies can be evaluated and improved through science domain projects.
Neoliberal logic (individualism, competition, market-centric approaches) emerging in project design and execution can be critically analyzed.
Science-based solutions considering social responsibility and sustainability can be developed and applied to practical tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
